body.raw:
{
    "title": "Land Grab Postman Copy",
    "codeName": "LandGrab",
    "description": "Claim territory by placing circles in a field of obstacles",
    "tutorial": "Claim territory by placing circles in a field of obstacles...",
    "prmSchema":  "{ \"$schema\": \"http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#\",  \"title\": \"Land Grab\", \"type\": \"object\", \"properties\": {  \"numCircles\": { \"title\": \"Number of circles allowed per team\", \"type\": \"integer\", \"minValue\": 1  },  \"goalArea\": { \"title\": \"Area of coverage that gets 100%\", \"type\": \"number\", \"minimum\": 0.0, \"maximum\": 10000.0  },  \"obstacles\": { \"title\": \"Blocked areas in 100x100 square\", \"type\": \"array\", \"items\": {  \"title\": \"Blocked rectangle\",  \"type\": \"object\",  \"properties\": { \"loX\": {  \"title\": \"Left edge\",  \"type\": \"number\",  \"minimum\": 0.0,  \"maximum\": 100.0 }, \"hiX\": {  \"title\": \"Right edge\",  \"type\": \"number\",  \"minimum\": 0.0,  \"maximum\": 100.0 }, \"loY\": {  \"title\": \"Bottom edge\",  \"type\": \"number\",  \"minimum\": 0.0,  \"maximum\": 100.0 },  \"hiY\": {  \"title\": \"Top edge\",  \"type\": \"number\",  \"minimum\": 0.0,  \"maximum\": 100.0 }  }  }  }  } }" 
}

{
    "title": "Jet ski",
    "codeName": "Solar Car?",
    "description": "Cutting Corrners",
    "tutorial": "cut corners",
    "prmSchema": "{   \"title\": \"Route Strategy\",   \"description\": \"A solar car route strategy\",   \"type\": \"object\",   \"properties\": {     \"Altitude Profiles\": {       \"type\": \"array\",       \"items\": {         \"type\": \"array\",         \"items\": {           \"type\": \"number\"         },         \"maxItems\": 2,         \"minItems\": 2       },       \"minItems\": 2     },     \"Cell Output profile\": {       \"type\": \"array\",       \"items\": {         \"type\": \"array\",         \"items\": {           \"type\": \"number\"         },         \"maxItems\": 2,         \"minItems\": 2       },       \"minItems\": 2     },     \"Friction\": {       \"type\": \"array\",       \"items\": {         \"type\": \"number\",         \"minimum\": 0,         \"exclusiveMinimum\": true       },       \"maxItems\": 2,       \"minItems\": 1     },     \"Energy /m alt\": {       \"type\": \"number\",       \"minimum\": 0,       \"exclusiveMinimum\": true     },     \"Battery I/o\": {       \"type\": \"array\",       \"items\": {         \"type\": \"array\",         \"items\": {           \"type\": \"number\",           \"default\": 1000         },         \"maxItems\": 2,         \"minItems\": 2       },       \"minItems\": 2     },     \"Regen Efficiency\": {       \"type\": \"number\",       \"minimum\": 0,       \"default\": 100,       \"exclusiveMinimum\": true     },     \"Initial Battery\": {       \"type\": \"number\",       \"minimum\": 0,       \"default\": 10,       \"exclusiveMinimum\": true     }   },   \"required\": [     \"Altitude Profiles\",     \"Cell Output profile\",     \"Friction\",     \"Energy /m alt\",     \"Battery I/o\",     \"Regen Efficiency\",     \"Initial Battery\"   ] }"
}
